Name: 24"h x 10"w Wire Stake
FullDescription:
• Fits all corrugated plastic signs up to 24"hx24"w
• Wire stakes slide directly into fluting of corrugated plastic signs--no hardware required!
• Dimensions: 24"h x 10"w
• Two support bars: one 8" from the top and one 8" from the bottom
• Weight: 5 ounces
• Material: 9 gauge galvanized steel (0.148")
• For Outdoor Use Only

Signs sold separately

Name: 30"h x 10"w Wire Stake
FullDescription:
• Fits all corrugated plastic signs  
  (works best with signs 24"hx24"w and smaller)
• Inserts directly into the sign--no hardware required
• Dimensions: 30"h x 10"w
• Support bars 8" from the top and bottom
• Material: 9 gauge wire (0.148")

Sign sold separately

Name: Premium Wire Stake
FullDescription:
• Fits all corrugated plastic signs
  (works best with signs 24"hx24"w and smaller)
• Legs made from thick 1/4" galvanized steel
• 9-gauge prongs insert directly into the sign--no hardware required
• Dimensions: 30"h x 10"w

Name: 12"h x 18"w Metal Frame - 1 rider (Black)
FullDescription:
• Works with 12"h x 18"w signs
• Offers both slide-in and bolt-in capability
• Coated to prevent rusting and to extend outdoor durability
• Sign Dimensions: 12"h x 18"
• Slide-in Rider Dimensions: 6"h x 18"w
• Bolt-in Rider Dimensions: Up to 18" wide
• Material: 3/4" angle iron legs and 3/4" angle iron cross bars
• Frame Dimensions: 40"h x 18.5"w
• Weight: 9 lbs.

Sign sold separately

Name: 18"h x 24"w Metal Frame - 1 rider (Black)
FullDescription:
• Frame Dimensions: 42"h x 24.5"w
• Weight: 11 lbs
• Material: 3/4" angle iron
• Powder-coated to prevent rusting and extend outdoor durability
• Works well with 18"h x 24"w Aluminum, Reflective Aluminum and Corrugated Plastic signs 
• Includes 6"h x 24"w rider sign spot for additional advertising space!
• Offers both slide-in and bolt-in capability
• Main panel and rider slide-in options include die-cut iron loops that hold panels up to 1/8" thick
• Bolt-in option requires holes at 14.5" on center for main panel and rider
• For Outdoor Use Only

Signs and Hardware sold separately

Name: 52" Straight Arm Post
FullDescription:
• Works with signs up to 24"h x 24"w
• Works with double sided signs
• Made of 1" square steel tube with a high gloss finish
(white) to protect against rusting
• Holes for sign hanging located 14" and 16" on center
• Two piece post slips together snap button holds in place
• Footstep helps keep the frame stable while being planted
• Studs welded on to the cross arm section of the frame for
  easy attachment of 6"x24" rider
• Stands a full 40" above the ground when inserted

Sign sold separately

Name: Double Lam Premium Coating
FullDescription:
Premium Protective Glossy Coating
  • Increased Anti-Scratch protection with 2x the coating application!
  • Provides a superior color boost over standard protective glossy coating

Name: Premium Coating
FullDescription:
Protective Glossy Coating
  • Anti-Scratch Coating that extends the life of the sign
  • Coating also makes the colors more vibrant

Name: Grommets - Centered
ShortDescription: For hanging panels for panels and fits our post products.
FullDescription:
For hanging panels and fits our post products. The grommet placement is as follows:

  • All grommet centers are 3/4” from the top and bottom edge of the material
  • 18”W & 24”W panels: 4 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)
  • 30”W & 36”W panels: 4 grommets - 19” on center (2 on top) and 16” on center (2 on bottom)
  • Riders (2 grommets): 2 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top)
  • Riders (4 grommets): 4 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)

Name: Grommets on Top and Centered
ShortDescription: For hanging panels for panels and fits our post products.
FullDescription:
For hanging panels and fits our post products. The grommet placement is as follows:

  • All grommet centers are 3/4” from the top and bottom edge of the material
  • 18”W & 24”W panels: 4 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)
  • 30”W & 36”W panels: 4 grommets - 19” on center (2 on top) and 16” on center (2 on bottom)
  • Riders (2 grommets): 2 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top)
  • Riders (4 grommets): 4 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)

Name: Holes4Corners + GrommetsInAllHoles
ShortDescription: For hanging panels for panels and fits our post products.
FullDescription:
For hanging panels and fits our post products. The grommet placement is as follows:

  • All grommet centers are 3/4” from the top and bottom edge of the material
  • 18”W & 24”W panels: 4 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)
  • 30”W & 36”W panels: 4 grommets - 19” on center (2 on top) and 16” on center (2 on bottom)
  • Riders (2 grommets): 2 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top)
  • Riders (4 grommets): 4 grommets - 16” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)

Name: Frame Holes - RiderHoles
FullDescription:
Fits our current angle iron and round rod frames. The hole placement is as follows:

  • All holes are 3/8” from the top and bottom edge of the material
  • 18”W panels: 4 holes - 14.5” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)
  • 24”W & 30”W panels: 8 holes - 14.5” & 17” on center (4 on top and 4 on bottom)
  • 36”W panels: 4 holes - 19” on center
  • Riders: 4 oval holes - 14.5”-16” on center (2 on top and 2 on bottom)

Name: Aluminum (.040) UPS
FullDescription: • Our most affordable option - a multi-purpose sign that can be used both indoors & outdoors

Name: Aluminum (.063) UPS
FullDescription: • A more durable, longer-lasting aluminum which can withstand harsher climates

Name: Reflective Aluminum (.040) UPS
FullDescription:
• High visibility reflective surface that meets ASTM D4956 Type I standards for non-critical signs
• Engineering-grade reflective will not rust
